name: A Way Home (UnrealAlpha)
description:
This is a game made for the EpicMegajam, here you play as a Brandish Science.ltd lab tester in the Arctic who gets sucked into a prototype portal at the second time of testing, in the first time the portal fails and contaminates the scientists with a new disease that spreads throughout the globe. With you, you find that many objects from the other side of the portal had been sucked in too, later you realise that you were teleported to a reality out of space and time, to escape this new realm you traverse across 4 different sub-realities, find a way home, a way back to earth. (Only use RTX or AMD’s 5000 series cards, since RayTracing is a big part of the game and the first level of the game is. Very taxing as well, while the others aren’t [First level - 16 FPS, Others levels - 60 - 80 FPS  on a RTX 2060]. And it is recommended to play with a Controller, )

Minimum specs - Intel i7 or Ryzen 7, Nvidia RTX 2060 or AMD Equivalent with RayTracing capabilities, 16 GB of RAM, and at least 15 gigabytes of free disk space

Recommended specs - Intel i7 or Ryzen 7, Nvidia RTX 3070 or RTX 2080Ti or AMD equivalents, 16 GB of RAM, and 15 gigabytes of free disk space
